message.raw:
Several improvements to URI class.

Closer to the RFCs defining an URI.
Added URI Fragment support.

This now breaks URIs with spaces (which do not follow the
RFCs), but these are now required in ign fuel. We must add
support for URI encoding before these changes can be merged.

support for URI encoding before these changes can be merged.

message:
Several improvements to URI class.

Closer to the RFCs defining an URI.
Added URI Fragment support.

This now breaks URIs with spaces (which do not follow the
RFCs), but these are now required in ign fuel. We must add
support for URI encoding before these changes can be merged.
